title: Ping is ridiculous past 7 PM for me
body:
Ok so I play League a lot as I'm sure most people who play it do. All day my ping is fine and at a static 40-43 which I've grown accustomed to.  BUT, any time past 7 PM my ping goes bonkers and to 400 at least. I don't know why this is since I can still play CS:GO and Terraria just fine without any problems at all. I'm assuming something happens to the servers at 7 PM EST. If this is not a server problem and this is some weird problem I have with my connection please tell me. This has been going on for months now it's not only today it's just that now's the only time I've felt the need to report it as it's causing me to play horribly and my teammates to flame me. Also, during some random games my ping will go from the 40-43 that it was at all game to 200 or 300 for a good minute or two then drop back down. This second issue happens at any given time in any given date and only happens once every few dozen games. Regardless, any help would be greatly appreciates 

 -   Truly yours, Some silver scrub

replies.body:
When latency (ping) increases after a specific time, it's usually due to an ISP changing the way they route traffic to a server in order to mitigate network congestion. This is the equivalent of taking the back roads to a location instead of the highway, which takes much longer. If the steps in the guide Rineyy linked in this thread do not resolve the issue, I recommend you run a set of traceroutes using our [quick guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) or using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/) for 5 minutes with the IP address 192.64.170.1, then exporting your results as a text. 

You'll then want to grab a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and the URL to a finished [Network Analysis.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1) Attach all these logs to a [ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech specialists can use their honed skills to work with you and resolve this quickly.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Yeah I tried everything on here. No luck. The lag is only getting worse I'm putting up a ticket like Targon's Blade said. Thanks for trying

To confirm the one troubleshooting step, you do use a wired Ethernet connection and not wireless to connect your computer to your router, correct?

Especially for people in an apartment complex or city neighborhood setting, where lots of people live in close proximity, wireless connectivity will get a lot worse in the evenings, when all their neighbors get home and start streaming Netflix et al. using their laptops, Chromecasts, PS4, etc.  

Similarly, if you have roommates sharing the Internet, the issue could be on your side as easily as your ISP's.  Which is why those steps exist in the troubleshooting guides.
